messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: OPERATION TAG: Theta-892 DATE: 07/22/39  A series of cyberattacks on city infrastructure systems, from traffic lights to water supply control, has caused chaos in the metropolitan area. Preliminary findings suggest the involvement of a notorious hacker group.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  OPERATION CHIEF: Captain M. N. Fletcher is directing efforts to neutralize the threat and trace the source of these attacks. CYBERSECURITY TEAM: Detectives O. P. Elliott and Q. R. Nash are working around the clock to secure vulnerable systems and decipher the malware used. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives S. T. Harper and U. V. Gibbs are collaborating with international agencies, as the hacker group has a global footprint. PATROL: Patrol Officers W. X. Yates, Y. Z. Boone, and A. B. Vega are dispatched to critical infrastructure points to monitor and report any physical threats. PR TEAM: Lieutenant C. D. Sloan is addressing the media, ensuring the public remains informed and calm. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  The hacker group left a digital signature mocking city officials, challenging them to stop the next attack.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain M. N. Fletcher  
Officer Context: Captain Fletcher is leading efforts against the cyberattacks.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Detective O. P. Elliott  
Officer Context: Detective Elliott is part of the cybersecurity team defending against the attacks.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective Q. R. Nash  
Officer Context: Detective Nash is assisting in system defense and malware analysis.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective S. T. Harper  
Officer Context: Detective Harper is liaising with international agencies to understand the hacker group better.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective U. V. Gibbs  
Officer Context: Detective Gibbs is also gathering intelligence on the notorious hacker group.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer W. X. Yates, Y. Z. Boone, and A. B. Vega  
Officer Context: These officers are stationed at vital infrastructure points to monitor for any tangible threats.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officers 

Officer Name: Lieutenant C. D. Sloan  
Officer Context: Lieutenant Sloan is responsible for keeping the public informed through media channels.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant
